00114   double FitConstants::pBeam() const {

00118   void FitConstants::pBeam(double p) {
00119     _pBeam=p;

00122 
00123   void FitConstants::pBeamScale(double p) {
00124     // rescale the scattering matrix
00125     // pBeam is the momentum for the calculated matrix
00126     // p is the new momentum
00127 
00128     // matrix elements go like 1/p*p
00129     double scale( (_pBeam*_pBeam) / (p*p) );
00130 
00131     // update the momentum in FitConstants, to make sure we know what momentum they are for...
00132     _pBeam=p;
00133 
00134     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00135       for(unsigned eh(0);eh<2;eh++) {
00136         for(unsigned i(0);i<21;i++) {
00137           if( _forwardScattering[xy][eh][i]>0.0) _forwardScattering[xy][eh][i]*=scale;
00138           if(_backwardScattering[xy][eh][i]>0.0) _backwardScattering[xy][eh][i]*=scale;
00139         }
00140       }
00141     }
00142     return;
00143   }
00144

00181   void FitConstants::beamAverage(unsigned d, double c, double a) {
00182     assert(d<=1);
00183     _beamAverage[d][0]=c;

00187   TMatrixDSym FitConstants::beamSpread(unsigned d) const {
00188     assert(d<=1);
00189     TMatrixDSym e(2);
00190     convertErrorMatrix(_beamSpread[d],e);
00191     return e;
00192   }

00194   double FitConstants::zLayer(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00195     assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00196     return _zLayer[d][l];
00197   }

00199   void FitConstants::zLayer(unsigned d, unsigned l, double z) {
00200     assert(d<=1 && l<=3);

00203 
00204   void FitConstants::beamSpread(unsigned d, const TMatrixDSym &e) {
00205     assert(d<=1 && e.GetNrows()==2);
00206     return convertErrorMatrix(e,_beamSpread[d]);
00207   }
00208 
00209   TMatrixDSym FitConstants::forwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p) const {
00210     assert(d<=1 && p>=electron && p<=hadron);
00211     TMatrixDSym e(6);
00212     convertErrorMatrix(_forwardScattering[d][p],e);
00213     return e;
00214   }
00215 
00216   void FitConstants::forwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p, const TMatrixDSym &e) {
00217     assert(d<=1 && p>=electron && p<=hadron && e.GetNrows()==6);
00218     return convertErrorMatrix(e,_forwardScattering[d][p]);
00219   }
00220 
00221   TMatrixDSym FitConstants::backwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p) const {
00222     assert(d<=1 && p>=electron && p<=hadron);
00223     TMatrixDSym e(6);
00224     convertErrorMatrix(_backwardScattering[d][p],e);
00225     return e;
00226   }
00227 
00228   void FitConstants::backwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p, const TMatrixDSym &e) {
00229     assert(d<=1 && p>=electron && p<=hadron && e.GetNrows()==6);
00230     return convertErrorMatrix(e,_backwardScattering[d][p]);
00231   }
00232   /*

00237     TMatrixDSym e(6);
00238     convertErrorMatrix(_forwardScattering[d][p],e);
00239

00241     e(4,4)+=_beamSpread[d][0];

00260   double FitConstants::probabilityCut(unsigned nDof) const {
00261     assert(nDof>0 && nDof<=4);
00262     return _probabilityCut[nDof-1];

00265   void FitConstants::probabilityCut(unsigned nDof, double c) {
00266     assert(nDof>0 && nDof<=4);
00267     _probabilityCut[nDof-1]=c;

00271 
00272   TBTrack::TrackFitInitialisation FitConstants::fitInitialisation(unsigned xy, unsigned fb, unsigned eh) const {
00273     assert(xy<2 && fb<2 && eh<2);
00274 
00275     TBTrack::TrackFitInitialisation fe;
00276     for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) fe.zLayer(i,_zLayer[xy][i]);
00277     fe.zBeam(_zBeam);
00278     fe.beamAverage(_beamAverage[xy][0],_beamAverage[xy][1]);
00279 
00280     TMatrixDSym e(6);
00281     if(fb==0) {
00282 
00283       convertErrorMatrix(_forwardScattering[xy][eh],e);
00284 
00285       TMatrixDSym b(2);
00286       convertErrorMatrix(_beamSpread[xy],b);
00287       if(e(4,4)>=0.0 && e(5,5)>=0.0 &&
00288          b(0,0)>=0.0 && b(1,1)>=0.0) {
00289         e(4,4)+=b(0,0);
00290         e(4,5)+=b(0,1);
00291         e(5,5)+=b(1,1);
00292 
00293         e(5,4)=e(4,5);
00294 
00295       } else {
00296         for(unsigned i(4);i<6;i++) {
00297           for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00298             e(j,i)=0.0;
00299             e(i,j)=0.0;
00300           }
00301           e(i,i)=-1.0;
00302         }
00303       }
00304 
00305     } else {
00306 
00307       TMatrixDSym b(6);
00308       convertErrorMatrix(_backwardScattering[xy][eh],b);
00309 
00310       e.Zero();
00311       for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00312         for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00313           e(i,j)=b(i+2,j+2);
00314         }
00315       }
00316  
00317       e(4,4)=-1.0;
00318       e(5,5)=-1.0;
00319     }  
00320 
00321     for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00322       if(e(i,i)>=0.0) e(i,i)+=_cError[xy][i]*_cError[xy][i];
00323     }
00324 
00325     fe.errorMatrix(e);
00326     return fe;
00327   }
00328 
00329   /*  
00330   TMatrixDSym FitConstants::alignmentMatrix(unsigned xy, unsigned eh, unsigned fb) const {
00331     assert(xy<2 && eh<2 && fb<2);
00332 
00333     if(fb==0) {
00334       TMatrixDSym b(6);
00335       convertErrorMatrix(_forwardScattering[xy][eh],b);
00336       return b;
00337 
00338     } else { 
00339       TMatrixDSym b(4);
00340       convertErrorMatrix(_backwardScattering[xy][eh],b);
00341       
00342       TMatrixDSym e(2);
00343       convertErrorMatrix(_beamSpread[xy],e);
00344       
00345       if(e(0,0)>=0.0 && e(1,1)>=0.0) {
00346         for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00347           if(b(i,i)>=0.0) {
00348             for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00349               if(b(j,j)>=0.0) {
00350                 b(i,j)+=e(0,0)
00351                   +e(0,1)*(_zLayer[xy][i]-_zBeam)
00352                   +e(1,0)*(_zLayer[xy][j]-_zBeam)
00353                   +e(1,1)*(_zLayer[xy][i]-_zBeam)*(_zLayer[xy][j]-_zBeam);
00354               }
00355             }
00356           }
00357         }
00358       }
00359 
00360       for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00361         if(b(i,i)>=0.0) b(i,i)+=_cError[xy][i]*_cError[xy][i];
00362       }
00363 
00364       return b;
00365     }
00366   }
00367   */  
00368   void FitConstants::writeIcc() const {
00369     std::ostringstream sout;
00370     sout << "FitConstants" << (unsigned)(10.0*_pBeam+0.5) << "GeV.icc";
00371     std::ofstream fout(sout.str().c_str());
00372  
00373     fout << "      pBeam(" << _pBeam << ");" << std::endl;
00374     fout << "      f.zBeam(" << _zBeam << ");" << std::endl;
00375     fout << std::endl;
00376  
00377     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00378       fout << "      f.beamAverage(" << xy << "," << _beamAverage[xy][0]
00379            << "," << _beamAverage[xy][1] << ");" << std::endl;
00380       fout << std::endl;
00381  
00382       for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00383         fout << "      f.zLayer(" << xy << "," << i << ","
00384              << _zLayer[xy][i] << ");" << std::endl;
00385       }
00386       fout << std::endl;
00387  
00388       for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00389         fout << "      f.cError(" << xy << "," << i << ","
00390              << _cError[xy][i] << ");" << std::endl;
00391       }
00392       fout << std::endl;
00393  
00394       TMatrixDSym bp(beamSpread(xy));
00395       fout << "      TMatrixDSym bp" << xy << "(2);" << std::endl;
00396       for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00397         for(unsigned j(0);j<2;j++) {
00398           fout << "      bp" << xy << "(" << i << "," << j << ")="
00399                << bp(i,j) << ";" <<std::endl;
00400         }
00401       }
00402       fout << "      f.beamSpread(" << xy << ",bp" << xy << ");" << std::endl;
00403       fout << std::endl;
00404  
00405       for(unsigned eh(0);eh<2;eh++) {
00406         TBTrack::FitConstants::Particle p((TBTrack::FitConstants::Particle)eh);
00407         
00408         TMatrixDSym fs(forwardScattering(xy,p));
00409         fs.Zero(); // CERN!
00410         fout << "      TMatrixDSym fs" << xy << eh << "(6);" << std::endl;
00411         for(unsigned i(0);i<6;i++) {
00412           for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00413             fout << "      fs" << xy << eh << "(" << i << "," << j << ")=";
00414             //if(eh==0) {
00415             fout << fs(i,j) << ";" <<std::endl;
00416             //} else {
00417             //  if(i==j) fout << "-1.0;" << std::endl;
00418             // else     fout << " 0.0;" << std::endl;
00419             // }
00420           }
00421         }
00422         fout << "      f.forwardScattering(" << xy << ",";
00423         if(eh==0) fout << "TBTrack::FitConstants::electron";
00424         else      fout << "TBTrack::FitConstants::hadron";
00425         fout << ",fs" << xy << eh << ");" << std::endl;
00426         fout << std::endl;
00427         
00428         TMatrixDSym bs(backwardScattering(xy,p));
00429         bs.Zero(); // CERN!
00430         fout << "      TMatrixDSym bs" << xy << eh << "(4);" << std::endl;
00431         for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00432           for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00433             fout << "      bs" << xy << eh << "(" << i << "," << j << ")=";
00434             //if(eh==0) {
00435             fout << bs(i,j) << ";" <<std::endl;
00436             //} else {
00437             //if(i==j) fout << "-1.0;" << std::endl;
00438             //else     fout << " 0.0;" << std::endl;
00439             //}
00440           }
00441         }
00442         fout << "      f.backwardScattering(" << xy << ",";
00443         if(eh==0) fout << "TBTrack::FitConstants::electron";
00444         else      fout << "TBTrack::FitConstants::hadron";
00445         fout << ",bs" << xy << eh << ");" << std::endl;
00446         fout << std::endl;
00447       }
00448     }
00449  
00450     for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00451       fout << "      f.probabilityCut(" << i+1 << ","
00452            << _probabilityCut[i] << ");" << std::endl;
00453     }
00454     fout << std::endl;
00455   }
00456   
00457   std::ostream& FitConstants::print(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00458     o << "FitConstants::print()" << std::endl;
00459     o << " Nominal momentum of beam = " << _pBeam << " GeV" << std::endl;
00460     o << " Z of first calorimeter = " << _zCalorimeter << " mm" << std::endl;
00461     o << " Z of nominal beam origin = " << _zBeam << " mm" << std::endl;
00462 
00463     o << " Probability cut for nDof 1-4 =";
00464     for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00465       o << std::setw(10) << _probabilityCut[i];
00466     }
00467     o << std::endl;
00468 
00469     for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00470       if(i==0) o << " X dimension" << std::endl;
00471       else     o << " Y dimension" << std::endl;
00472 
00473       o << " Beam average position and tan(angle) = " << _beamAverage[i][0]
00474         << " mm, " <<  _beamAverage[i][1] << std::endl;
00475       
00476       TMatrixDSym b(beamSpread(i));
00477       o << " Beam spread matrix" << std::endl;
00478       for(unsigned j(0);j<2;j++) {
00479         o << "  ";
00480         for(unsigned k(0);k<2;k++) {
00481           o << std::setw(13) << b(j,k);
00482         }
00483         o << std::endl;
00484       }
00485         
00486       o << " Tracking layer z values" << std::endl;
00487       for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00488         o << std::setw(13) << _zLayer[i][j];
00489       }
00490       o << std::endl;
00491 
00492       o << " Tracking layer intrinsic errors" << std::endl;
00493       for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00494         o << std::setw(13) << _cError[i][j];
00495       }
00496       o << std::endl;
00497 
00498       TMatrixDSym e(forwardScattering(i,electron));
00499       o << " Electron forward error matrix" << std::endl;
00500       for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00501         for(unsigned k(0);k<6;k++) {
00502           o << std::setw(13) << e(j,k);
00503         }
00504         o << std::endl;
00505       }
00506 
00507       e=backwardScattering(i,electron);
00508       o << " Electron backward error matrix" << std::endl;
00509       for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00510         for(unsigned k(0);k<6;k++) {
00511           o << std::setw(13) << e(j,k);
00512         }
00513         o << std::endl;
00514       }
00515 
00516       e=forwardScattering(i,hadron);
00517       o << " Hadron forward error matrix" << std::endl;
00518       for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00519         for(unsigned k(0);k<6;k++) {
00520           o << std::setw(13) << e(j,k);
00521         }
00522         o << std::endl;
00523       }
00524 
00525       e=backwardScattering(i,hadron);
00526       o << " Hadron backward error matrix" << std::endl;
00527       for(unsigned j(0);j<6;j++) {
00528         for(unsigned k(0);k<6;k++) {
00529           o << std::setw(13) << e(j,k);
00530         }
00531         o << std::endl;
00532       }
00533 
00534       if(i==0) o << std::endl;
00535     }
00536 
00537     return o;
00538   }
00539 
00540   void FitConstants::convertErrorMatrix(const double *d, TMatrixDSym &e) const {
00541 
00542     assert(d!=0);
00543 
00544     unsigned n(0);
00545     for(int i(0);i<e.GetNrows();i++) {
00546       for(int j(0);j<=i;j++) {
00547         e(i,j)=d[n];
00548         e(j,i)=d[n];
00549         n++;
00550       }
00551     }
00552   }
00553 
00554   void FitConstants::convertErrorMatrix(const TMatrixDSym &e, double *d) {
00555     assert(d!=0);
00556 
00557     unsigned n(0);
00558     for(int i(0);i<e.GetNrows();i++) {
00559       for(int j(0);j<=i;j++) {
00560         d[n]=e(i,j);
00561         n++;
00562       }
00563     }
00564   }
